attributes.action: Have the ulster banner as official flag of Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: To make the ulster banner the official flag of Northern Ireland as its own country's flag (as Scotland & Wales have there own) law
attributes.background: Make the ulster banner as the official flag of Northern Ireland

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the designation of specific flags.

We could accept a petition calling for a requirement for the Ulster Banner to be flown from public buildings in Northern Ireland, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
